channel.title: Meteoro's GI turbo (0-7)
channel.description:
* Game starts at Today 7:30 PM * Days are 15 minutes. Twilight is 2 minutes. Nights are 5 minutes, unless I’m a failure and extend it. * Early day actions will be processed during the day, late day actions will be processed during Twilight * There can be more than one King, but only a King election will take place once there are no Kings remaining. * I’m on movile,so have mercy * The amount of players are infinite but there must be at least 7 players.
# There is no line for classes until the game begins.
Classes will be watered down if they are not able to be used in Turbo, if classes can not work in turbo situations like this, they will be re-rolled
Game will have BD,unseen,and maybe NK and neutrals. If other factions roll,they will be changed to BD or unseen You will be given 2 classes,you will pick one to play as and the other will be discarded.

item.title: Meteoro's GI turbo (0-7)
item.dc:creator: Meteoro
item.description:
• Game starts at Today 7:30 PM
  • Days are 15 minutes. Twilight is 2 minutes. Nights are 5 minutes, unless I’m a failure and extend it.
  • Early day actions will be processed during the day, late day actions will be processed during Twilight
  • There can be more than one King, but only a King election will take place once there are no Kings remaining.
  • I’m on movile,so have mercy
  • The amount of players are infinite but there must be at least 7 players.

There is no line for classes until the game begins.

Classes will be watered down if they are not able to be used in Turbo, if classes can not work in turbo situations like this, they will be re-rolled

Game will have BD,unseen,and maybe NK and neutrals.
If other factions roll,they will be changed to BD or unseen
You will be given 2 classes,you will pick one to play as and the other will be discarded.

Read full topic
